dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so I'm reading this, and... uh, 1,600 square meters? Of fire? In a dormitory?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so I'm reading this, and... uh, sixteen hundred square meters? Of fire? In a dormitory?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A fire broke out in a six-story mansard-style dormitory in Astana... The fire was fully extinguished, covering an area of 1,600 square meters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but like, no injuries reported. Fifty people evacuated safely, including seven kids. That's the main thing, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but like, no injuries reported. Fifty people evacuated safely, including seven kids. That's the main thing, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fifty people, including seven children, were evacuated safely. No injuries were reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No injuries? Are you kidding me? A fire covering one thousand six hundred square meters in a six-story dorm? That's, like, huge!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No injuries? Are you kidding me? A fire covering one thousand six hundred square meters in a six-story dorm? That's, like, huge!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A fire broke out in a six-story mansard-style dormitory in Astana... No injuries were reported. The fire was fully extinguished, covering an area of 1,600 square meters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it wasn't a catastrophe. They got everyone out. That’s, you know, a success story for the emergency services.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it wasn't a catastrophe. They got everyone out. That's, you know, a success story for the emergency services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Success? How does it even get to that point? What about prevention? Why was it allowed to get so big in the first place?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Success? How does it even get to that point? What about prevention? Why was it allowed to get so big in the first place?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Things happen. The important part is they responded. Quickly, too. Water supplied without interruption.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Things happen. The important part is they responded. Quickly, too. Water supplied without interruption.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Water was supplied to the fire site without interruption.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Without interruption" doesn't change the fact that an entire section of a building nearly went up in flames! This is negligence, um, almost.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Without interruption doesn't change the fact that an entire section of a building nearly went up in flames! This is negligence, um, almost.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Negligence? No one was hurt! They got everyone out. That's what matters here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Negligence? No one was hurt! They got everyone out. That's what matters here.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fifty people, including seven children, were evacuated safely. No injuries were reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They got lucky, Host_B. Extremely lucky. That's not the same as a controlled, uh, outcome.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They got lucky, Host_B. Extremely lucky. That's not the same as a controlled, uh, outcome.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's not luck. It's deployment of smoke protection units, it's search and rescue ops. It's professionals doing their job.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not luck. It's deployment of smoke protection units, it's search and rescue ops. It's professionals doing their job.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Firefighters quickly deployed smoke protection units and began search and rescue operations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Their job should also include, like, making sure it doesn't spread across 1,600 square meters! That’s the real story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Their job should also include, like, making sure it doesn't spread across sixteen hundred square meters! That's the real story.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The fire was fully extinguished, covering an area of 1,600 square meters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You're always finding something wrong, though. They saved lives. That's a huge win.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're always finding something wrong, though. They saved lives. That's a huge win.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I'm just stating what the article says. One thousand six hundred square meters. That's terrifying.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm just stating what the article says. One thousand six hundred square meters. That's terrifying.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The fire was fully extinguished, covering an area of 1,600 square meters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And I'm stating what the article also says: no injuries. Zero. For a fire that big. That’s, like, actually amazing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I'm stating what the article also says: no injuries. Zero. For a fire that big. That's, like, actually amazing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I just... I don't see how you can be so dismissive of the actual scale of destruction here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I just... I don't see how you can be so dismissive of the actual scale of destruction here.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm not dismissive. I'm just looking at the full picture. Everyone is safe. That’s a win. Full stop.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm not dismissive. I'm just looking at the full picture. Everyone is safe. That's a win. Full stop.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fifty people, including seven children, were evacuated safely. No injuries were reported.
